recipe.title: Gluten Free Chocolate Cookies
recipe.comment: c/o Gluten Free Reduced Calorie Cookbook by Connie Sarros with cazzie tweaks
recipe.step: Preheat oven to 180C and grease a cookie tray. Sift flour, cocoa, baking soda and sugar sugar n a bowl. Stir in oil and eggs. Once combined stir through choc chips. Place heap TBSP on cookie sheet and cook for 7-10 minutes. Cool on wrack completely before storing in an airtight container (I f they last that long!)
